AirTravelEnrgyUse.name: AirTravelEnrgyUse
AirTravelEnrgyUse.description: Represents the energy consumption related to air travel.

AirTravelEmssnFctrId.description: The air travel emission factors that are used to calculate the emissions.

CarbonFootprintReportDate.description: The date when the carbon footprint data of the associated stationary asset is due to be sent to a reporting body.

Ch4PassengerKmInKgCo2e.description: The CH4 emissions per kilometer that's calculated based on the emission factor.

Ch4PassengerMileInKgCo2e.description: The CH4 emissions per mile that's calculated based on the emission factor.

Co2PassengerKmInKg.description: The CO2 emissions per kilometer that's calculated based on the emission factor.

Co2PassengerMileInKg.description: The CO2 emissions per mile that's calculated based on the emission factor.

CostCenter.description: The cost center associated with this energy use record.

DestinationCity.description: The destination city of the air travel.

DestinationCountry.description: Specifies the destination country of the air travel.

EndDate.description: The date until when the values of this energy use record are valid.

HaulLength.description: The haul length calculated based on the segment distance and the haul-length of the associated emissions factor record.

IsRecordLocked.description: Indicates whether the air travel energy use record is locked for editing because the associated carbon footprint is locked for editing.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

N2oPassengerKmInKgCo2e.description: The N2O emissions per kilometer that's calculated based on the emission factor.

N2oPassengerMileInKgCo2e.description: The N2O emissions per mile that's calculated based on the emission factor.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

Scope3CrbnFtprntId.description: The scope 3 carbon footprint record that's associated with this energy use record.

Scope3EmissionsInTco2e.description: The total scope 3 emissions in metric tonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent.

Scope3EmssnSrcId.description: The scope 3 emission source that's associated with this energy use record.

SegmentDistance.description: The segement distance for this air travel record.

SegmentDistanceInMiles.description: The segment distance for this air travel record in miles.

SegmentDistanceUnit.description: The unit of measure for the segment distance.

SourceCity.description: The source city of the air travel.

SourceCountry.description: Specifies the source country of the air travel.

StartDate.description: The date from when the values of this energy use record are valid.

SuplScope3Emissions.description: The supplemental scope 3 emissions value thatâ€™s used to calculate the total scope 3 emissions.

TravelerBaseCity.description: The base city of the air traveler.

TravelerBaseCountry.description: Specifies the base country of the air traveler.

VendorProvidedEmissionsInTco2e.description: The scope 3 emissions provided by the vendor to override the calculated total scope 3 emissions.
